metadata.Title: CVE-2015-8786 on Ubuntu 23.04 (lunar) - negligible.
metadata.Description:
The Management plugin in RabbitMQ before 3.6.1 allows remote authenticated users with certain privileges to cause a denial of service (resource consumption) via the (1) lengths_age or (2) lengths_incr parameter.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2015-8786` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

rabbitmq-server - 3.6.6-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: rabbitmq-server package in lunar, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '3.6.6-1').
